exceptions.exn: In environment plus_cancel_l' := plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c a, n : nat Unable to unify "power n (?M1448 + 1) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial n i * power (n - i) ?M1448 * power i 1)" with "power (n + 0) (1 + a) = ∑ (S (n + 0)) (fun i : nat => binomial (n + 0) i * power i a)".

original: rewrite <- (Nat.add_0_r n). apply Newton_nat with (b := 1) (n := n). simpl. apply sum_0n_scal_r.
